title: HAP 76 - Michael Dawson on Garvey and Black Nationalism
itunes:title: HAP 76 - Michael Dawson on Garvey and Black Nationalism
description: An interview with Michael Dawson, who explains Marcus Garvey's black nationalism and how this and other political ideologies, like socialism and liberalism, have fared from the time of Garvey down to the present day.
content:encoded: An interview with Michael Dawson, who explains Marcus Garvey's black nationalism and how this and other political ideologies, like socialism and liberalism, have fared from the time of Garvey down to the present day.
itunes:subtitle: An interview with Michael Dawson, who explains Marcus Garvey's black nationalism and how this and other political ideologies, like socialism and liberalism, have fared from the time of Garvey down to the present day.
itunes:summary: An interview with Michael Dawson, who explains Marcus Garvey's black nationalism and how this and other political ideologies, like socialism and liberalism, have fared from the time of Garvey down to the present day.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
